name: Pink Lemonade
description:
My take on a pink lemonade.

LA Lemonade is the star of the show here, i think it is a very good flavor alone, but it can most certainly be build on really well aswel. 

FA Lemon Sicily is here to give a little boost to the lemonade, you can leave it out if you please, it is still really good.

INW Raspberry/TFA Sweet Raspberry is part of the pink here, it's a combo i dig, if you dont like INW Raspberry you can leave it out.

FA Strawberry/TFA Ripe is the last part of the pink. It's not super prominent, but it gives a little extra to the recipe..

Add Polar Blast or Koolada @ 0.5-0.75% for that feeling of a fresh cold drink. You can ofcourse increase this as you please.

Good as SnV but 3 days will do the INW raspberry wonders.
author: Flyver
